titles.title: Your Name Is An Ointment Poured Forth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your name is an ointment poured forth: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! Your name is an ointment poured forth, Your name is an ointment poured forth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Therefore do the virgins love Thee Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! Therefore do the virgins love Thee, Therefore do the virgins love Thee,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Draw me, and I’ll run after Thee: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! Draw me, and I’ll run after Thee, Draw me, and I’ll run after Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Make haste, my Beloved, to come: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! Make haste, my Beloved, to come, Make haste, my Beloved, to come.{/lang-eng}
